title: Mac Game Full Screen Mode Frame Drop
body:
Hey,

I am not an expert but I have constantly been receiving frame drops after this most recent patch. This usually occurs whenever I try to use chat or back. And also occurs inbetween whenever random shit triggers it. This frame drop drops to 0 frames so it is quite frustrating to deal with for 4 seconds.

To my knowledge it is due to the new update screwing over mac full screen mode. I noticed that full screen doesn't work as it used to. I used run hot corners and never had an issue with them activating in game before but now they do. Whenever i tab in and out my screen goes white partially. Something that does not usually happen.

Is this fixable using my settings or do I simply need to wait till Riot fixes their spaghetti code.

I've lost too many games and received a low priority queue for this so until someone has a definitive fix I don't want to play anymore.

replies.body: i will also add I have a retina display mac.
